name: The Cogworks
description:
This is a very early alpha build of the game. There is much more to be worked on and a bunch of new assets to be added.

CONTROLS: 

Mouse click  to activate the Push/Pull mechanic.

Bottom left UI button "Toggle" is to switch between the Push/Pull modes. 

WASD or Arrows to tilt the camera to see stuff (or touch the bars on the top and sides)

Escape to close/quit.

Top right button is if you got stuck on a level and just want to go see what they other buttons are.
